suppress.notes: SpringBoot only uses snakeYaml to parse application.yaml file so this security vulnerability should not be a risk, info in AM-2517 comments

CVE-2022-22978 suppression (false positive), because spring security already at (5.7.5) this is higher than the vulnerable versions (5.5.x prior to 5.5.7, 5.6.x prior to 5.6.4) https://tanzu.vmware.com/security/cve-2022-22978
